ModMetaData.name: ATR Frames Reforged - Android Tiers
ModMetaData.description:
V1.0 This mod adds an additional frame (more in the future) to be used with the Android Tiers mod.
Alignment Frame: Originally designed for the M.U.F.F. unit, but now seeing much greater use with the superior TORT, this frame aligns the components associated with the primary motor function elements of a creature - that of carrying "itself" (and its essentials) from A to B. - Carrying Capacity +90 - Movement Speed +1.6
Happy to add other unique frames if people want them.
ModMetaData.author: MasterOfGrey
